Package chav1961.purelib.streams

This package contains a set of classes and interfaces to support stream processing of the different sorts.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    JsonSaxHandlerFactory
    This Utility class allow you to build JsonSaxHandler implementation for automatic deserialization of any classes from JSON.
    JsonSaxHandlerFactory.PrimitiveCollection  
    JsonSaxParser
    This class implements a SAX-styled JSON parser to use in the in-stream JSON parsing application.
    JsonStaxParser
    This class implements a StAX-styled JSON parser to use in the in-stream JSON parsing application.
    JsonStaxPrinter
    This class implements a StAX-styled JSON printer to use in the in-stream JSON uploading application.
    ReaderWrapper
    This wrapper class can be used in conjunction with any Reader to get full access to Reader's methods without extending existent class to wrap.
    StreamsUtil
    This is an useful utility class to support a lot of popular operations on streams.
    WriterWrapper
    This wrapper class can be used in conjunction with any Writer to get full access to Writer's methods without extending existent class to wrap.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    JsonStaxParser.LexType
    This enumeration describes types of JSON lexemas in the input stream

Package chav1961.purelib.streams Description

This package contains a set of classes and interfaces to support stream processing of the different sorts.

Package content

chav1961.purelib.streams package

This package contains a JSON SAX-styled parser JsonSaxParser to process very large JSON streams. Current implementation defaults, that JSON stream will contains line-splitted JSON, because parsing of 'anaconda-styled' JSON radically reduces it's performance. This package also contains an utility class for building JSON handler for quick-and-simple deserialization JSON content into Java classes. It also contains two useful wrappers for Reader and Writer

Since 0.0.2 the package has two new classes for JSON StAX-style parsing and printing data. They implements JSON format according to RFC-7159 notation.

chav1961.purelib.streams.charsource package

This package contains a collection of CharacterSource implementations. Character source is a facade to different data sources (string, files and so on) for using in parsers.

chav1961.purelib.streams.chartarget package

This package contains a collection of CharacterTarget implementations. Character target is a facade to different data targets (string, files and so on) for using in different printing tools.

chav1961.purelib.streams.byte2byte package

This package contains a ZLib compression and decompression streams.

chav1961.purelib.streams.char2byte package

This package contains a collection of Writer implementations. The most important example of this implementations is a Java bytecode Assembler. It gets source assembly program as text and translates it to the Java class definition according to Java class file format specifications. This Assembler uses as usual Writer and not need any special case to use.

chav1961.purelib.streams.char2char package

This package contains a collection of Reader and Writer implementations. The most important example of this implementations is a Creole Writer and Preprocessing reader. Creole writer gets source content formatted with the Creole markup language (see www.wikicreole.org) and convert it to a set of predefined formats (text, HTML, XML:FOP). Preprocessing reader gets any input with the preprocessor instructions similar to C/C++ and processes reading content according them.

Since:
0.0.1 last update 0.0.2
Author:
Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
